mainText:
I am a fairly new customer to Apple. At least in the aspect of the 
Macintosh operating system. I am sorry for your loss; but not just your 
loss but mine as well. Steve had a great way of running things which 
created this amazing operating system i fell in love with. Please don't 
destroy what Steve spent his life building. I trust he left Apple in 
good hands and i want you to do it like Steve would. Thank you.
author: Justin
